headline: Interpublic Declares Common Stock Dividend
summary: New York, NY, May 22, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Interpublic Group (NYSE: IPG) today announced that the company’s Board of Directors has declared a quarterly dividend on IPG common stock of $0.33 per share, payable on June 16, 2025, to holders of record at the close of business on June 2, 2025. # # # About InterpublicInterpublic (NYSE: IPG) (www.interpublic.com) is a values-based, data-fueled, and creatively-driven provider of marketing solutions. headline: Dividend Yields Vs. Treasury Yields
summary: While down a bit today, this week has seen a spike in long-term Treasury yields.

headline: Omnicom Group: Poised For A Breakout With IPG Acquisition And AI-Led Transformation
summary: Omnicom Group's positive free cash flow and manageable debt offer financial stability. Click here to read why OMC stock is a Hold.
